tool_description: Build applications that track the movement of your business
name: HyperTrack
title: HyperTrack

api_list.name: CreateNewTrip
api_list.description: Generate routes and estimates on arrival, get notified when devices arrive at or leave the specified destination, and get trip summaries upon completion

api_list.name: CompleteExistingTrip
api_list.description: Generate routes and estimates on arrival, get notified when devices arrive at or leave the specified destination, and get trip summaries upon completion
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hypertrack1.p.rapidapi.com/trips/x/complete"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hypertrack1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hypertrack1.p.rapidapi.com/trips/x/complete"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hypertrack1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
